articles.title: Curriculum vitae

articles.title: Roni Shen
articles.contents:
Roni Shen

            Roni Shen
          
          
            
              I am currently working towards a doctoral degree in Technology Management at the University of California, Santa Barbara. My research interests include diversity in the tech industry, team cognition, and social implications of future technologies.
              Previously, I have worked in the fields of fisheries management, veterinary medicine, business administration, and organizational development. Most recently, I managed and facilitated the expansion of a small start-up veterinary company.
